mapper.select: SELECT C.menu_seq AS menu_seq, C.menu_code AS menu_code, C.user_id AS user_id, C.menu_title AS menu_title, C.menu_img AS menu_img, C.menu_option AS menu_option, F.file_seq AS f_seq, F.file_original AS f_original, F.file_upname AS f_uname, L.custom_seq(COUNT) AS custom_seq FROM tbl_custom C LEFT JOIN tbl_file F ON C.menu_seq = F.file_seq LEFT JOIN tbl_like L ON C.menu_seq = L.like_seq WHERE C.menu_seq = #{menu_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_custom(menu_seq, menu_code, user_id, menu_title, menu_img, menu_option) VALUES( #{menu_seq}, #{menu_code}, #{menu_writer}, #{menu_title}, #{menu_img}, #{menu_option} )
mapper.update: INSERT INTO tbl_custom( menu_seq, menu_code, user_id, menu_title, menu_img, menu_option) VALUES( #{menu_seq}, #{menu_code}, #{menu_writer}, #{menu_title}, #{menu_img}, #{menu_option} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE menu_code=#{menu_code}, menu_writer=#{menu_writer}, menu_title=#{menu_title}, menu_img=#{menu_img}, menu_option=#{menu_option}

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tbl_custom( menu_seq BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, menu_code BIGINT NOT NULL, user_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, menu_title VARCHAR(125) NOT NULL, menu_img VARCHAR(256), menu_option VARCHAR(256) )
